Special: Blast (2), Maximal, Overheats

Note: Overheats on a 91+. Whenever wielder rolls a double on the Ballistic Skill Test to fire this weapon, they must immediately make a -10 Willpower Test or suffer 1d10 nonpermenant Willpower Damage and gain 1 Corruption for every Degree of Failiure.
